column2: "They were with the Darkers, so the Darkers must have dragged them along, but why damage the residential area?"
"I'd understand if they were targeting ARKS, but I don't get the senseless destruction!"

"...What could be the reason...
Maybe they're being manipulated? That would be pretty sad."

"I want to free them as quickly as possible, but I'm not that strong...
I'm begging you, go in my place!"
